      • run

        public boolean run()
        Run when serverpackcreator is run in either -cli or -cgen mode. Runs what used to be the main content in Main in pre-1.x.x. times. Inits config checks and, if config checks are successfull, calls methods to create the server pack.
        Returns:
        Return true if the serverpack was successfully generated, false if not.

      • cleanupEnvironment

        void cleanupEnvironment(java.lang.String modpackDir)
        Deletes files from previous runs of serverpackcreator.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. The directory in where to check for files from previous runs.

      • copyStartScripts

        void copyStartScripts(java.lang.String modpackDir,
                      java.lang.String modLoader,
                      boolean includeStartScripts)
        Copies start scripts for Forge modloader into the server_pack folder.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. Files will be copied into subfolder server_pack. Checks for valid modpackDir are in ConfigCheck.
        modLoader - String. Determines whether start scripts for Forge or Fabric are copied to modpackDir. Checks for valid modLoader are in ConfigCheck.
        includeStartScripts - Boolean. Whether to include start scripts in server_pack. Boolean.

      • copyFiles

        void copyFiles(java.lang.String modpackDir,
               java.util.List<java.lang.String> copyDirs,
               java.util.List<java.lang.String> clientMods)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Copies all specified folders and their files to the modpackDir.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. /server_pack. Directory where all directories listed in copyDirs will be copied into.
        copyDirs - String List. The folders and files within to copy.
        clientMods - String List. List of clientside-only mods NOT to copy to server pack.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Only print stacktrace if it does not start with java.nio.file.DirectoryNotEmptyException.

      • excludeClientMods

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> excludeClientMods(java.lang.String modsDir,
                                                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> clientMods)
        Generate a list of all mods in a modpack EXCEPT clientside-only mods. This list is then used by copyFiles.
        Parameters:
        modsDir - String. /mods The directory in which to generate a list of all available mods.
        clientMods - List String. A list of all clientside-only mods passed by copyFiles, which is then removed from the list generated in this method.
        Returns:
        List String. A list of all mods inside the modpack excluding the specified clientside-only mods.

      • copyIcon

        void copyIcon(java.lang.String modpackDir)
        Copies the server-icon.png into server_pack.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. /server_pack. Directory where the server-icon.png will be copied to.

      • copyProperties

        void copyProperties(java.lang.String modpackDir)
        Copies the server.properties into server_pack.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. /server_pack. Directory where the server.properties. will be copied to.

      • installServer

        void installServer(java.lang.String modLoader,
                   java.lang.String modpackDir,
                   java.lang.String minecraftVersion,
                   java.lang.String modLoaderVersion,
                   java.lang.String javaPath)
        Installs the files for a Forge/Fabric server.
        Parameters:
        modLoader - String. The modloader for which to install the server.
        modpackDir - String. /server_pack The directory where the modloader server will be installed in.
        minecraftVersion - String. The Minecraft version for which to install the modloader and Minecraft server.
        modLoaderVersion - String. The modloader version for which to install the modloader and Minecraft server.
        javaPath - String. Path to Java installation needed to execute the Fabric and Forge installers.

      • zipBuilder

        void zipBuilder(java.lang.String modpackDir,
                java.lang.String modLoader,
                java.lang.Boolean includeServerInstallation,
                java.lang.String minecraftVersion)
        Create a zip-archive of the serverpack, excluding Mojang's minecraft_server.jar. With help from https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1091788/how-to-create-a-zip-file-in-java
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. The directory where the zip-archive will be created and saved in.
        modLoader - String. Determines the name of Minecraft#s server jar which will be deleted from the zip-archive.
        includeServerInstallation - Boolean. Determines whether the Minecraft server jar needs to be deleted from the zip-archive.
        minecraftVersion - String. The Minecraft version of which to delete the server jar. Used if modloader is Forge.

      • generateDownloadScripts

        void generateDownloadScripts(java.lang.String modLoader,
                             java.lang.String modpackDir,
                             java.lang.String minecraftVersion)
        Calls methods for generating download scripts for Mojang's Minecraft server depending on the specified versions and modloader.
        Parameters:
        modLoader - String. The specified modloader determines the name under which Mojang's server jar will be downloaded as.
        modpackDir - String. /server_pack The directory where the scripts will be placed in.
        minecraftVersion - String. The version of the Minecraft server jar to download.

      • fabricShell

        void fabricShell(java.lang.String modpackDir,
                 java.lang.String minecraftVersion)
        Generates download scripts for Mojang's Minecraft server for Fabric,Linux.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. /server_pack The directory where the scripts will be placed in.
        minecraftVersion - String. The version of the Minecraft server jar to download.

      • fabricBatch

        void fabricBatch(java.lang.String modpackDir,
                 java.lang.String minecraftVersion)
        Generates download scripts for Mojang's Minecraft server for Fabric,Windows.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. /server_pack The directory where the scripts will be placed in.
        minecraftVersion - String. The version of the Minecraft server jar to download.

      • forgeShell

        void forgeShell(java.lang.String modpackDir,
                java.lang.String minecraftVersion)
        Generates download scripts for Mojang's Minecraft server for Forge,Linux.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. /server_pack The directory where the scripts will be placed in.
        minecraftVersion - String. The version of the Minecraft server jar to download.

      • forgeBatch

        void forgeBatch(java.lang.String modpackDir,
                java.lang.String minecraftVersion)
        Generates download scripts for Mojang's Minecraft server for Forge,Windows.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. /server_pack The directory where the scripts will be placed in.
        minecraftVersion - String. The version of the Minecraft server jar to download.

      • downloadFabricJar

        boolean downloadFabricJar(java.lang.String modpackDir)
        Downloads the specified version of Fabric.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. /server_pack The directory where the Fabric installer will be placed in.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the download was successful. False if not.

      • latestFabricInstaller

        java.lang.String latestFabricInstaller(java.lang.String modpackDir)
        Returns the latest installer version for the Fabric installer to be used in ServerSetup.installServer.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. /server_pack The directory where the Fabric installer will be placed in.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the download was successful. False if not.

      • downloadForgeJar

        boolean downloadForgeJar(java.lang.String minecraftVersion,
                         java.lang.String modLoaderVersion,
                         java.lang.String modpackDir)
        Downloads the specified version of the Forge installer to be used in ServerSetup.installServer.
        Parameters:
        minecraftVersion - String. The Minecraft version corresponding to the Forge version. Minecraft version and Forge version build a pair.
        modLoaderVersion - String. The Forge version corresponding to the Minecraft version. Minecraft version and Forge version build a pair.
        modpackDir - String. /server_pack The directory where the Forge installer will be placed in.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the download was successful. False if not.

      • deleteMinecraftJar

        void deleteMinecraftJar(java.lang.String modLoader,
                        java.lang.String modpackDir,
                        java.lang.String minecraftVersion)
        Deletes Mojang's minecraft_server.jar from the zip-archive so users do not accidentally upload a file containing software from Mojang. With help from https://stackoverflow.com/questions/5244963/delete-files-from-a-zip-archive-without-decompressing-in-java-or-maybe-python and https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-8186227
        Parameters:
        modLoader - String. Determines the name of the file to delete.
        modpackDir - String. /server_pack The directory in which the file will be deleted.
        minecraftVersion - String. The Minecraft version of which to delete the server jar. Used if modloader is Forge.

      • cleanUpServerPack

        void cleanUpServerPack(java.io.File fabricInstaller,
                       java.io.File forgeInstaller,
                       java.lang.String modLoader,
                       java.lang.String modpackDir,
                       java.lang.String minecraftVersion,
                       java.lang.String modLoaderVersion)
        Deletes remnant files from Fabric/Forge installation no longer needed.
        Parameters:
        fabricInstaller - File. Fabric installer to be deleted.
        forgeInstaller - File. Forge installer to be deleted.
        modLoader - String. Whether Forge or Fabric files are to be deleted.
        modpackDir - String. /server_pack The directory where files are to be deleted.
        minecraftVersion - String. Needed for renaming the Forge server jar to work with launch scripts provided by serverpackcreator.
        modLoaderVersion - String. Needed for renaming the Forge server jar to work with launch scripts provided by serverpackcreator.
